Package dev.vince.colorify.ansi

Enum AnsiCodeEnum

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<AnsiCodeEnum>
dev.vince.colorify.ansi.AnsiCodeEnum
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<AnsiCodeEnum>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum AnsiCodeEnum extends Enum<AnsiCodeEnum>
The AnsiCodeEnum class is an enum that contains all the ANSI color codes and ANSI format codes. All the codes are in the form of a String and can be applied to any String. The enum also contains a method to apply the code to a String and reset the code.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
dev-vince
